document_data.name: Palarandusk's Fire Breath
document_data.mainbody: '''''Palarandusk's fire breath''''' was an [[arcane magic|arcane]] [[evocation]] [[fire]] [[spell]] that allowed the caster to spit a gout of flame.
document_data.Effects: The gout of flame was a cone measuring {{SI|10|ft|long=yes}} in length. The flames burned anything caught within the cone with increasing intensity based upon the caster's skill. The caster experienced a nasty case of heartburn after casting this spell.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s to cast.
document_data.History: This spell was developed by the [[gold dragon]] [[Palarandusk]].
